website_summaries.verdict: A decent option for a wipes case, but tends to be hard to open.
pros: Customers love that this keeps wipes moist and has a solidly made design
Most felt it was attractive and good quality for its cost
cons: Tends to be difficult to open or pop open suddenly

customer_reviews.title: Cute little wipe travel case
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is super cute! Seems to seal well so far and doesn't dry out the wipes. There is a little plastic thing on the inside that I think is there to hold the wipes down but I had to take it out to use because it is placed too high and the wipes cover up the attachment. But it still works great without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Lou

customer_reviews.title: good quality.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, seems solid, good quality. I use target brand baby wipes and they fit well in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Breaks within days, wipes dry out quickly
customer_reviews.text: When I place wipes in it, I realized it held less than the amount stated on its description. Once I closed it, it didn’t stay shut the clasp is very easy to open, a slight touch or if it hits something in the diaper bag it’ll instantly open up. It was very much of a hassle to keep it closed which caused the wipes to dry out very quickly. After about 4 days it broke in half. The plastic that was holding both pieces together was thin and it easily broke apart. Don’t recommend this product even if you’re looking for something not as pricy, because you’ll end up having to buy something else after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay closed. I've used this item a total of one time. Haven't exactly left my house due to covid, so imagine my chagrin when I found this open with dry wipes the first time I went to actually use it. I added a video to show how easily it opens with a slight touch. So, if you throw it in a bag, be aware you might end up with dry wipes or wipes all over the inside of your bag.
customer_reviews.author: E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: If you like your wet wipes all dried out, then this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: What is the point of making this silicone seal at the top, when you're going to put this useless clasp closure on the side that opens just by looking at it? This has the weakest "clasp" and will not seal shut, so you best believe you're gonna come back to a bunch of dried up wipes. This may be made better by adding a rubber gasket beneath the lip, like those found on glass Tupperware containers to create a solid lock, but with its current design it simply doesn't do the job it was designed to do. . They need to go back to the drawing board on this one.
customer_reviews.author: EN

customer_reviews.title: the latch sucks
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this light, compact wipe holder EXCEPT for the flimsy latch on the front to place the wipes inside the container. There's no snap to it to ensure that the containers stays shut, so I had to put a rubber band around the holder and over the latch. I shouldn't have to do this. Due to the reasonable price and the other good features, I will keep it, but I really with that the latch was secure.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Long

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I am not pleased. The "cap"on the top where wipes should pull from does not open...at first i thought it was my arthritis. Nope. Two sons and two grandsons gave up after a whole lot of cussing!! Junk, pure junk. I really needed this to hold antibacterial wipes during this Corona Pandemic i guess I will look at other products. I would send back but like mostl Americans I'm being smart...staying home and staying safe...!!
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but this is not the quality I expected. The clasp does not keep the lid closed so my wipes end up drying out. Also, the strap turned black from being in a dark bag and this has barely been used. I took the strap off because it then looked dirty even after soaking in bleach. My baby was born in January so I have barely even used my diaper bag since the pandemic hit in March. I cannot imagine this would hold up if used on a regular basis. Will be buying something else to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go Clorox wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t purchase this to use for my toddler. I needed a travel container to keep homemade Clorox wipes. I took fragrance free baby wipes and poured Clorox bleach and lemon scented Pine Sol to make wipes for work. This is handy to keep in your desk drawer or in the car. To get more wipes in the case I took out the pop up device that is located at the bottom of the container. Without this part I was able to get 35 wipes in it. It is keeping my wipes moist and me germ free while on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Diva

customer_reviews.title: Annoying product
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the car for myself if I ever need to wipe my face after a long sweaty day at work (especially in the summer). The product doesn’t stay close too well and wipes may dry easily if you don’t close it all the way. The latch to refill the wipes doesn’t “snap” like most products so you constantly have to keep checking to see if it is still closed. I actually had to use a rubber band to keep the snap lid close otherwise all my wipes will dry out. Will not buy or recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was a disappointing purchase. For one; the container can only hold a very small number of wipes and I mean, a VERY small number. Two, it opens SUPER easily. If it bumps anything, it pops open and you lose your wipes; I suppose I should look at the quantity it holds as a plus at this point. It’s visually appealing and attachment strap is easily secured and sturdy, I just wish this was a better product. If I wouldn’t have to wait in line at the post office during a pandemic, I’d totally return.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Mold issue
customer_reviews.text: I opened up the case to pull out a wipe the other day and noticed mold growing in the container! I really wanted something to carry wipes in my diaper bag but guess this isn't it. Also, the top circular part that is meant to open and close over the wipes doesn't close well and I always feel like liquid from the wipes will spill into my bag.
customer_reviews.author: LifestylebyFrancesca

customer_reviews.title: very weak clasp
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed clasp that will not stay closed. It's so weak that it will unhinge with the slightest touch. This makes the silicon lining useless because it doesn't close all the way. I expect the wipes to dry out very soon. The on the flip side, the center lid requires all your strength to pry open. They definitely did not make this easy to use. The only reason I chose this over Oxo is because of the see-through case and design. Oh how I regret it now.
customer_reviews.author: Totes Magotes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clip shut
customer_reviews.text: I think I might have gotten a defected one, because I have one in teal that works amazingly, which is why I ordered this one. I ordered the gray one and it doesn't stay closed at all. I gave it 3 stars because I truly believe mine was just defected. I kept it because I threw out the packaging it came in before I started to use it and realized the problem. It had dried up all the wipes. I think if I need to use it, I can maybe use tape to hold it closed for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Viviana

customer_reviews.title: Not the ideal
customer_reviews.text: First of all when I wanna buy a wet wipe container I would hope this thing can keep my wipes wet and moist. This case is not well sealed so you can’t really expect to put your wipes inside and hope the wipes lasting moist for a long period..... maybe just for a week then the wipes start to dry out. Second, the reason you want to subpack the wipes is to bring it out but reduce the weight instead of taking a heavy whole pack with you. However this product uses a heavy material and doesn’t make it light enough to carry. So I end up giving up using it. Waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Chieh Lu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying just enough wipes
customer_reviews.text: I really like it but this is not for lazy people because it does not hold a lot. I removed the little piece inside to fit more wipes. I have a habit of checking how much is left before going out so it’s not a problem for me but for those who forget to check or not liking to refill all the time, you are better off not buying this item. This perfectly serves a purpose of carrying enough wipes on the go and it doesn’t make that “bag noise” in quiet places like church or movie theater.
customer_reviews.author: SAMC

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this cute little case!
customer_reviews.text: Love this handy little travel wipes case! Bought this because of Covid and put my sanitizing wipes in it! I keep this in my purse to take with me wherever I go. this is perfect to keep my sanitizing wipes in a secured closed container so I can have it whenever I need, and the color is very pretty and I love the little handle if I wanted to hang it in my car or wherever.
customer_reviews.author: Customers

customer_reviews.title: A nope for me
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, the main opening for refilling it flies open all the time. I lost all of my wipes just walking through the airport. I tried again thinking maybe I didn't clip it shut tight enough but nope, 2 minutes later it flew open again and I lost a second batch of wipes. Plus the little flap to get a single wipe out is rediculously hard to get open and I ripped a couple wipes trying to get them out. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Terres-Sigman

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I ordered two! I just wish they fit more wipes.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it doesn’t fit very many wipes! Other than that it’s perfect. It clips right onto anything! The closure is great. I ordered these because I buy my wipes in bulk but hate the thin little closure that always seems to fall off. Not to mention you end up pulling half the package out at once. With these you don’t end up pulling a ton of them out at once and the lid stays shut very well. Loved it so much I ordered two!
customer_reviews.author: Mickenzie

customer_reviews.title: "big" disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly intended to be an item for "on-the-go" (thus the name) and that's what we purchased it for, but it seems way too big for that. It's almost as big as the pack of wipes themselves. What's the point? The photos made it seem way more compact, and we were pretty disappointed when we got it. In all, haven't gotten a ton of use out of it. We have generally been pretty happy with most Skip Hop products, but this was the rare let down.
customer_reviews.author: mileslouis

customer_reviews.title: The case broke after few times using it
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to get this product. I was disappointed to find the case broken after just few times using it. It broke on the opposite side of the opening. I am careful with my stuff, nobody jumped on it, I did not drop it on the floor. I was just filling it with wet wipes, closing and opening. I do regret I did not get similar item second hand for half of the price or less.
customer_reviews.author: micha.h12345

customer_reviews.title: keeps wipes ready to use for a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of one of these wipes containers. I wanted to be able to have one in the car and one in the diaper bag. They work well and keep the wipes from drying out. The strap is durable and has held up well for over a year on our first one. The size is large but I like that since I use it for dry wipes that I moisten with water. It’s also large enough to split wipes in half for newborns and be able to reach both stacks from the hinged top.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to carry around with me inside my backpack. I really, really like it. It's sturdy and the seal works extremely well keeping your wipes nice and moist. It has been eleven days since the arrival of my purchase and the wipes that I placed in the case as soon as it arrived are still moist. For my use it holds just enough wipes. I absolutely adore this item!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t trust to hang it because it doesn’t latch well. It doesn’t completely shut. It easily opens, which will make all the wipes fall. It looks nicer than the other wipe containers we have, but the closure quality is horrible. I don’t think this is a defect. I believe they’re all poorly made like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed the lid doesn’t close well
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product as I need something like this. And I should have read the reviews before purchasing. But others are correct when they say the closure isn’t great. It opens very easily, too easily! I get you think moms have their hands full and need an easy open but we don’t need it that easy. It makes the wipes dry out. Such a bummer. Other than that it worked great. I need to wrap some thing around it to keep it shut. But that defeats the purpose when I have to fill it often. Really disappointed I spent money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: i was so excited for this because it had so many good reviews and i absolutely HATE it it’s so hard to open so when you’re trying to change a baby quickly out in public it’s super aggravating. the wipes all come out at once. and it’s bit bigger than i expected it to be
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Will do in a pinch.
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this is that the closures are well sealed. The strap is also sturdier than the other, more malleable wipe envelopes available. What I am not so thrilled about is the weight, though not much can be done about that, if durability is to be had. Also, the plastic piece that pushes the wipes up takes up valuable space that could be used with, well, more wipes! But, if one has a good habit of refilling the container before outings, should be no problem at all. Will do in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Hijeen

customer_reviews.title: Best on the go wipe holder for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has this- I love it and decided to get one for my car. Loved it so much, bought an additional one for hiking/camping. Easy to use, refill; can hold more than you think and easy to stash. No drying out with silicon middle pullout feeder. A must have for travelers. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Find in Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to be awesome. I had used one of those “ziplock” type Huggins brand reusable bags for travel with my first child, but decided to “upgrade” fir travel with our newest addition. This case, though looks like it seals well, ended up letting my wipes dry up. However, I did let the wipes sit in there for over a month, but the whole point was to not have to worry about dried out wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Arixht

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold enough wipes for a newborn. It’s poop. It’s hard to open with one hand and doesn’t close all the way with a good amount of wipes. I bought two and they were a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: superradicalxo

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't hold many Huggies wipes
customer_reviews.text: This product is very convenient because I don't like bringing around the entire package of wipes. However, It doesn't hold as many wipes as I expected. I use Huggies wipes and this case only holds about 10-15 of them. If I put more than that, the first several wipes tear up as I try to pull them out. 10-15 wipes are sometimes not enough on the go. It might be good for thinner wipes...
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does sellers and Amazon know not all customers live in the USA to return faulty products. Customers that live in the Caribbean have their products shipped to Miami and then we have to pay a price from Miami to our specific destination. What's worst is when the product is faulty we have to PAY TO RETURN to Amazon which is no benefit to us whereby we lost. And if we do choose that option we have to PAY AGAIN for the returned item from Miami to our country. I hate when I purchase a product and it faulty. My money was totally wasted. DISAPPOINTED, HATE THIS PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Charles

customer_reviews.title: great idea, does not work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, one for me and one for my husband. One never even got opened. You cant fit very many wipes in it. every time I would go out I would run out of wipes and the piece that keeps the wipes tight in there keeps it too tight! the wipes would rip in half while trying to get one out. Not worth it, just carry a small or half used pack of wipes with you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wipes are drying out!!
customer_reviews.text: Super unhappy with the redesign of this product. I really wish OXO would switch back to the old interlocking pieces to close the container. The lid constantly pops open drying out wipes and it doesn’t matter the amount of wipes that are inside. We had two that are about a year or two old before purchasing two more.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to refill wipes
customer_reviews.text: Got this to have on the changing table to refill with wipes. It is comfortable to use and saves me the discomfort of using huge bags of wipes or the expanse of buying many small packs. Two things to consider: 1 - doesn’t contain a large amout of wipes. 2 - the top part doesn’t open or close easily and requires two hands. As I don’t use it on the go (just at home) the above aren’t an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: NaTalie

customer_reviews.title: Great but one tiny flaw
customer_reviews.text: I hated lugging around the giant packs of wipes and wanted to get something refillable, I like the size and quality of these, the one reason it got 4 stars was cause how easily the latch pops off, it doesn’t secure well, a little tape does the trick but still annoying
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: NOT a Happy Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: I was happy when this arrived. Promptly put wipes in it and attached it to my Skip Hop bag. Yay for having wipes at an easy access during this pandemic!!! Except, even with the slightest bump the container pops open and the wipes come crashing down, onto the filthy ground. UGH. I've already started my return.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this it’s not air tight my wipes were dry two days after putting them in here, it is a cute design and I would love it if they made a product with a better seal, no matter how many wipes are in this it never closes to where there isn’t a small gap even when empty, sad I was excited about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Wipes can definitely get out of order, ESPECIALLY if you buy them by the bulk. Sometimes you just dont want to carry that big bag of wipes, this is where this comes to play. Just enough wipes to get you through a day or maybe a couple, depending on your use. And its nice and durable, like a hard-shelled plastic, the top clicks in to close.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Creates less weight to dipper bag
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I’m giving it four stars and not five is because when you try to close it is a little too hard and to open it too. Other than that I love that I don’t have to carry a big bag of wipes. It definitely creates less weight to my babies dipper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Perla

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I put wipes in to use for travel and the liquid that’s in the wipes leaked out and the case wasn’t even half full. It’s also big not something you can carry around discretely. Ur better off buying one of those plastic ones so at least the liquids from the wipes won’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product even if you don't have babies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in Antibacterial wipes while we travel. (wipe down the plane handles, Trays, Etc) and it works perfectly. The only thing was that sometimes it would pop open and all the wipes would com out. It Happened twice. It was hanging on my backpack and I was just walking so I'm not sure if jostling around on top of my backpack caused it or what, but just watch out for that. Other than that, I love it! I ended up buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Swanson Fam

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't Seal if it holds too many wipes
customer_reviews.text: If you put too many wipes in, it won't "seal" completely. I'm not really sure it would completely seal if there wasn't too many in. The latch is not that secure but I put two strong rubber bands around the ends so it should be ok. The top part where you pull the wipes out is good though. I'm hoping this works to keep wipes moist.
customer_reviews.author: svette

customer_reviews.title: Wipes never dry out!
customer_reviews.text: So my Graco diaper bag backpack that I have, comes with a portable wipes container on the side like this. Except the Graco one is not very good at all and wipes dry out all of the time in it! So, I threw that one away. This wipes container fits right into the Graco diaper bag backpack and wipes never dry out! I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Megan L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Size, But Doesn't Keep Wipes Moist
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Baby Wipes Dispenser to use in my nursery with 7th generation wipes, and love love love it. So I figured maybe this product would help keep my wipes from drying out in my car... but, alas, after 2 weeks in the car my wipes are still dry. I think this might be great for cooler climates or for if you buy wipes in bulk and need a smaller container. However, if keeping wipes MOIST is your goal, then this product will not help you.
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed fails to seal and hold the wipes within
customer_reviews.text: Initially when I used it worked perfectly fine the wipes are wet in place snaps and stores well But after using it to for few months the box lost its seal, whenever I went to change my baby diaper the wipes have fallen inside the bag in struggle to open the top flap the entire box itself falls on the floor which in return souls all the wipes before use Got myself a new wipes box hope that is better the new on open with single hand in this case u need to use both hands
customer_reviews.author: Nvk

customer_reviews.title: Good for cloth wipes
customer_reviews.text: We use this for cloth wipes. It has never leaked and holds enough wipes for a day trip. There is a clip that pushes wipes up that is removable. This fits nicely in our diaper bag or in the diaper clutch. Open easily.
customer_reviews.author: SmalltownMomma

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, compact, and great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wipe holder!! Keeps all liquid locked in. Very compact. Fits in diaper bag. Lightweight and excellent. I love it! Great for travel. The original wipes bag always leaks into my bag and this is the perfect solution!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lazar

customer_reviews.title: This is MUCH better to have on hand than a big pack of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a total game changer for changing diapers while out and about. It keeps the wipes from drying out and doesn't take up a ton of room in the diaper bag. My only issue is that it's tough to pull wipes out of a bigger package and fold them back up to place them in this container. That's not a reflection of this product though, just the process of loading the wipes into it. This is MUCH better to have on hand than a big pack of wipes that wouldn't get used up before drying out.
customer_reviews.author: McBlaser

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: So its cute by the looks but the lock on it is so fragile, can barely fit any wipes in it without it leaving open cracks around the edges, dries out wipes and busts open by just layin it on the bed.. its not what I expected at all. Highly disappointed because i was looking forward to using it..
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lopez

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND! ♡
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I was wondering why there was a plastic silicone part inside, but it was just an inner spring that helps wipes pop out! Really convenient to use when I don't have to grab an entire wipes and I can just use this wipes case! Definitely would recommend! ♡
customer_reviews.author: Rina Pasamonte

customer_reviews.title: Very practical and can be used in 2 ways
customer_reviews.text: The pouch has a removable ledge, you’ll find you can fit more wipes if you remove it. The wipe breaks when I pull it from top dispenser (may be the brand of wipe I use -flushable- so could easily break) so I just open the pouch every time I need a wipe. No bother or extra work (for me). I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better sealing so wipes don't dry to FAST!
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty awesome concept, but it dries the wipes in no less than 3 days, also it only takes so little wipes. I would say it's sturdy. I ended up having to take out what holds the wipes in place so i can add more wipes, but this time with a ziplock baggie so they don't dry so fast
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality, I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn’t stay closed no matter how little wipes were in it. Bummed me out cause I could so have used this for a car wipes holder or one to hang on my wheelchair but it kept opening up and so my wipes didn’t stay moist.
customer_reviews.author: TBEAR91

customer_reviews.title: Life Necessity
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I’ve made in 2018. I usually just get travel baby wipes but realized that sometimes they dried out because of the packaging or they’d fold over and it’d just be ugly. But this is durable and it carries a lot and keeps all of them moist!! Even if you don’t have a baby, it’s a must have if you carry any sort of wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable wipes holder
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and durable and love how I can see if I’m about to start running low. I’m giving it a 4 start just because sicne it is durable and well made, it is al title heavy. I can feel the added weight to my bag. So I plan to keep just for our outings. When I can clip it on the stroller. Overall it’s a great wipe holder and still highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Guinn87

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser lid snaps shut a bit harshly, but that will wear down from continued use. Fits easily in the diaper bag and perfect for if you buy bulk wipes that just come in the big ziploc bags, or if you make your own wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely a must. HATE being wistful and like refilling my self. I actually bought 2 and great price. Truly recommend only down side is that the lid is a bit stiff but hopefully it loosen up the more I use them
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M

customer_reviews.title: Mixed reviews
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this wipe container to travel. I needed to take wipes withought having to carry a big pack. And for a couple of days it is ok. But if you think the wipes will stay moist for longer you are WRONG 🙅🏻‍♀️! I opened the container a week after my trip and they were bone dry. I would not purchase this item to carry with diaper bags.
customer_reviews.author: paulina casillas

customer_reviews.title: Quite convenient however...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a more compact way to carry around wipes. However this is smaler than i had anticipated. I had hoped i could fit half a puch of wipes in it but i can barely fit 1/4 of a normal pouch of pamper wet wipes in it...if that. Would love this if only it had been able to fit more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Le

customer_reviews.title: Do. Not. Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Crap. Crap. Crap. Skip Hop should be ashamed of themselves for producing such a garbage piece of baby equipment. It doesn't stay closed. Would need to be refilled every day. Requires a rubberband around it to keep wipes from falling out. It's crap. Plain and simple. If it didn't cost the environment more than the value of it I'd send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't snap closed tight on the side
customer_reviews.text: I like them except for one thing - On the side where the case opens and closes and you insert the wipes, it does not snap closed tightly and the wipes could leak or not make a good seal, however the snap on top is great.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Wipe case
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected to get I got product since my baby has tendency of wanting to always open wipe case taking all wipes out i seen this one looked at review thought it would be the best fit but it doesn’t do the job the top where wipes come out is pretty good so doesn’t open easily which is what I like but the side where it open it opens waaaaaaaaaaaaay to easy even when I store it away in diaper bag and it also doesn’t hold enough wipes like I thought it would. I just wasn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: This is a Must have for baby and mom.
customer_reviews.text: It makes my diaper bag slimmer. You can also hang it on the stroller so its very useful. I buy wipes at the Costco I always need a zip lock or any container. This is perfect and Exactly what I need it.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Liked the design and idea of having an organized way to carry wipes but am a bit disappointed with this item. The insert that is supposed to help the wipes pop up comes undone often and makes it hard to get the wipes out easily. I’ve used this item a few times but have given up. I have gone back to using a good old zip lock bag to carry the wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Socomom97

customer_reviews.title: Good case.  Seal could be better.
customer_reviews.text: We make our own baby wipes and needed a case to take them out with us. This case is good at retaining the wipes while making them accessible via the top opening. The reason I took 1-star off is because there always seems to be a gap in the rubber seal between the two halves. While our wipes haven't dried out (they don't tend to anyways), it certainly isn't sealed well.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Travel friendly
customer_reviews.text: This wipes case is perfect for traveling. This comes handy when we go for parks,playareas. One should invest on it if they have a kid most importantly..felt like price is bit higher side
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Cute, and works.
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for a few months I changed my review as this product works fine and I have not had a time where my wipes went dry. I keep it in my purse, backpack or in my car and have never had that happen. I would reccomend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rumi N.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design, don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed because I love the other Skip Hop products I've purchased. Unfortunately, this thing is garbage. It only holds a few wipes and you can't move it anywhere without the side latch popping open.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seal
customer_reviews.text: No good. It doesn't seal, probably because the clasp is not secure. If it gets nudged at all, it pops open. Also too bulky to fit into a standard inner diaper bag pocket. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Nixipixi

customer_reviews.title: Won't Stay Closed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store Clorox wipes as I travel from school to school as an itinerant educator. Holds about a dozen wipes. The pop-up closure to dispense works fine and stays closed, but the main latch to load the wipes is too easy to unlatch. Really needs to be more secure to prevent it from popping open while moving about. My 'solve' was to wrap a rubberband around the whole thing and that does the job. Just kind of disappointed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was a little wider than I expected, but still fit in my diaper bag pocket just perfect, so I'm super happy with my purchase, seems like good quality, it will definitely help us out a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Katelyn Gann

customer_reviews.title: Not good for makeup wipes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a childless Millennial. It's important to note this product does not quite fit the square sized makeup wipes you would get from Target. I had to tape the sides down. Simply writing this review so other childless Millennial's don't make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I recieved this item and happy to try it out. Ive placed wipes in it on few occasions and everything turned out great. You have to ensure that you dont put too much wipes in it as it will open when in ur bag etc. Other than than it is cute and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mama_New

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: If I don’t use my wipes up within a couple of days they start to dry out. That being said I love this container! So much nicer than having a big old crinkly pack of wipes in the package they come in. And it’s pink and cute hahah
customer_reviews.author: Karlyanne

customer_reviews.title: Latch is not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The latch that holds the wipe holder closed is not sturdy enough. It comes open so easily! The wipes all fall out. So annoying. I requested a replacement thinking it was defective. The replacement was exactly the same. So I’m sending both back.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra phaengdy

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT CLOSE!! 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: I got this because i wanted a wipe case in my car for emergencies. I dont know if it was just my case that is like this but it doesn’t close. it opens up by itself and it’s annoying. I cannot pull out a wipe without it opening up the whole case. Tried putting less wipes but nothing. it just doesn’t work...
customer_reviews.author: itzel tilapa

customer_reviews.title: Crappy latch
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look, feel , and idea of this travel case .. but the latch to close it was really poorly designed. It doesn’t ‘snap’ closed and takes very little for it to just swing open and drop your wipes everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: If the container is cold, wipes seem to rip. Also, the wipes tend to clump up until the container is halfway empty. The side lock does not completely close no matter how full or empty the container is. Not bad for the price, but definitely prefer the plastic travel wipe holders that come in bulk wipe orders over this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No, no, no!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. Literally only holds like 15 wipes. Try to put any more in and it will bust open or be so tight that you can barely get the wipes out. Just cheap, poorly designed and not helpful for a mom that needs wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: Rubber bands or Gorilla Tape.
customer_reviews.text: The strap on the wipes dispenser is super convenient and works well. The dispenser lid does it's job. The actual clasp that holds the top and bottom together doesn't work at all but, with some rubber bands or Gorilla Tape it doesn't pop open in a parking lot dumping all the wipes in oil. Oh! And the travel aspect does work hence the extra star.
customer_reviews.author: PDro

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this. The only thing about it is that you can’t place a lot of wipes on here, so if your going out for a couple of hours it’s not dependable. Also i left some wipes enclosed for awhile, when i returned to use them, they were dry.
customer_reviews.author: jassiel

customer_reviews.title: As pictured !
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews before ordering this and many people say they had gotten it broken or it broke a few days later . I've had mine for almost a month now and I absolutely love it ! It fits in the diaper bag side pocket and gets caught on nothing when my other cases would . Also had ordered mine used and just the package was a little tore off . Everything else was great !
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel but the downfall is that the wipes dries up over a week. So if you use wipes fairly quickly this would be perfect . The container also pops open from time to time when you accidentally bang it on things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Asian Persuasion

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hold much, like 10 to 15 wipes. That is nothing for a newborn/baby. Cant spend the day or a period out just with that. Tried to used it a couple times bur was easier and better just take the wipe package with me at my nursery bag. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Filipe Zancul

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: You can’t put a lot of wipes in it which makes it inconvenient I would say this hold max 20 wipes efficiently. (I was wanting something that held at least 40) If you put any more then that the wipes get stuck and rip. Also it’s hard to close it all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Emmillia Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing seal
customer_reviews.text: Not a good seal. I doubt this will keep the wipes moist for a long period of time and it doesn’t hold very many wipes. Disappointing product.
customer_reviews.author: KLark

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold that many wipes, and the watching system that keeps it shut to entire thing crappy... But the latch that word come out if hole very secure. I wouldn't buy again or for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: There is a small plastic piece inside that is meant ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a small plastic piece inside that is meant to push wipes up to make it where wipes are always at the top, but it doesn't work as intended I can't put very many wipes in because it takes up so much space and wipes end up tearing pulling them out because it pushes too hard on them. I ended up taking the piece out and it been much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: karabbeara

customer_reviews.title: Better options out there
customer_reviews.text: I now have this one and a OXO brand travel Wipe dispenser & the OXO one is 1000 times better. It’s bigger (holds more wipes), is easier to open and close, etc. The wipe holder arm thing inside broke within the first few days of use. Don’t get this one, get the OXO one!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn G

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it but its not convenient at all its doesn't close properly so when you go to pull a wipie out it opens all the way and its a hassel
customer_reviews.author: Normiizz

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Th is is super cute ..doesn’t fit a ton of wipes in here but it holds enough to last a few days. Love the peachy color and the strap for stroller
customer_reviews.author: Astreetz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!  Recommend this 1000 times
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it’s hard but very small fits enough white bees for an outing with my children if it’s in my purse I stopped using a diaper bag and went to a purse and it’s very durable opens and closes right
customer_reviews.author: Krista Wofford

customer_reviews.title: Latch doesn't stay closed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wipes dispenser for our diaper bag and wanted something that was compact and wouldn't take up much space. Once I started putting wipes into the case, I noticed the slightest touch would open the latch. I even made sure that I didn't put more than the recommended 25 wipes. I'm pretty disappointed in this product because it seemed to have really great reviews initially. As I dug deeper into the reviews, I noticed this is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Alombro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Exactly as described. Only holds 25 wipes but if you take out the small plastic piece on the inside then you can fit a few more. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep Clorox Wipes in my gym bag and it works perfectly! Keeps the wipes moist and is a convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly. I wanted to love this but they leak!! I use Water Wipes and if I put a little amount of a lot. They just leak. So unfortunate cause I needed this.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Just get a small travel pack of wipes instead. Since I buy wipes in bulk I was hoping to just fill this and use it to save some space and lighten the diaper bag. It does it’s job and all , but it doesn’t hold as many as I thought and the opening isn’t as great as I would hope.
customer_reviews.author: Travis G.

customer_reviews.title: The best wipes carrier
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mom of four and have had this for over a year. I love it! Seal is extremely secure and does not allow wipes to dry out. There is a flexible piece in the bottom that pushes wipes to the opening so you're never stuck fishing around for the next one. Easy to grab and go and slides nicely into my diaper backpack. Would definitely buy again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: The dispenser needs to be a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.text: This wipe dispenser is great for on the go, especially if you buy wipes in bulk! The dispenser keeps the wipes moist and seals/closes very easily. The only thing I don’t like which I learned the first time after using it, is that you can’t fill the it all the way. If there is too many wipes in it, you can’t pull the wipes out without them tearing it. The wipe dispenser is great overall I just wish I could fit more wipes in it!
customer_reviews.author: Edie

product_meta.title: Skip Hop On-The-Go Baby Wipes Dispenser, Grey
product_meta.description:
Color:Wipes Case GreyWith a secure, wide opening and a moisture-stay seal, our baby wipes case is the answer to fresh wipes every time. Whether you drop it in your diaper bag or use the built-in strap to hang it on your stroller, it's the perfect, go-anywhere solution. Features: Silicone seal locks in moisture so wipes stay fresh; inner spring helps wipes pop out easily; secure-snap lid; holds up to 25 wipes to keep you and baby Covered for a day out and about!; translucent case lets you see when to refill; silicone strap attaches to any stroller or bag; PVC- free, Phthalate-free.

BRAND STORY
By Skip Hop
feature_bullets: Silicone Seal Locks In Moisture So Wipes Stay Fresh. Inner Spring Helps Wipes Pop Out Easily. Secure-snap Lid
To Fill: Open Case From Side, Insert Refillable Wipes. Overfilling Will Affect Dispensing Function
Holds Up To 25 Wipes To Keep You And Baby Covered For A Day Out And About!
Inner Spring Helps Wipes Pop Out Easily. To Fit Even More Wipes, Remove Colored Spring From Inside The Case.
Translucent Case Lets You See When To Refill. Silicone Seal Locks In Moisture So Wipes Stay Fresh
Silicone seal locks in moisture so wipes stay fresh
Inner spring helps wipes pop out easily
Holds up to 25 wipes to keep you and baby covered for a day out and about
Translucent case lets you see when to refill

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars3,448 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
